basic.Peptide Name: D16W (GGN4 analogue peptide with single substitution)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.12199716]Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus (MIC=25 µg/ml), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=2.5 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Klebsiella pneumoniae (MIC=10 µg/ml), Shigella dysentariae (MIC=10 µg/ml), Pseudomonas putida (MIC=100 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=50 µg/ml), Eshchericia coli (MIC=10 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium (MIC=50 µg/ml).
